oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Wish Some of That Would Trickle Down on Me!"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Politics and Legislation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Worker watching while a politician pours "U.S. Foreign Aid" into a cup for another politician.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
